website_summaries.verdict: Throw sham offered in vibrant colors with quality stitching. This is a solid product.
pros: Comes in a variety of sizes
Comes in a variety of colors
Needs frequent washing if using in a home with pet hair
cons: A little expensive for a single sham
Attracts lint, dust and pet hair

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Pillows were exactly the color, size and texture that we needed. They look good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Morales

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great but I ordered the 26x26 size to fit some very plump euro pillows (size 26x26) and the covers are way too large. Even after washing and putting them in the dryer, the pillows don't even come close to making it into the corners of the covers. I emailed the seller about the size before ordering and was told these would be the correct size. Unfortunately, I didn't do anything with them for a while after receiving them and I felt too much time had elapsed to return them. I think I would have been better off with the 24x24 covers to fit my 26x26 pillows.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: The perfect yellow...
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillows, they are just the perfect color of yellow that I was looking for. I purchased my pillow cases in 24x24 but filled them with 26x26 pillows because I like them to be full-bodied and fluffy. And I am always paranoid that the colors do not match the picture so I have included pictures just to compare the picture to the actual product. I love this product and would recommend it a thousand times over! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: June Alexander

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: ANOTHER BIG FAT ZERO IF I could rate this item zero Size fits unlike the other product I purchased BUT there is a TWO INCH BLUE mark on one side of in the fabric! Is the seamstress blind? Really? Who inspects these items? Who sells items that are unacceptable but people who are more concerned with making a buck and who don't care about repeat business. DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: lee rotzien

customer_reviews.title: Very, very poor quality...NOT WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: These are the flimsiest pillow covers, very thin and the stitching is not good. The zippers are barely stitched on and the sewing in general is not good. Mine tore as I was stuffing the pillow very gently inside. To make matters worse, the company sewed a white tag on the outside of the pillow cover, which you have to cut off but it still shows a very obvious white spot where the tag is sewn into the side stitching. Very poor quality. I wouldn't pay more than $2 for this item, much less the price I paid. I'm hoping to successfully send mine back. They are definitely NOT WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This honestly exceeded my expectations. The fabric is tough and seems to be sewn well. The zipper is a good quality. The color is perfect for my purpose (I'm decorating it to use as an accent pillow). If you were going to sleep on it I expect it may be a little rough but I would also expect it to soften up a bit with use and washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amber W.

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and color is nice but material is very rough
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and color is nice but material is very rough. I tried using fabric softener but didn't work. I bought this for my travel pillow. It's ok if you are going to use it only for a decorative accent. I can't use it next to my face. Way to scratchy. I feel like I wasted my money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Melodi A Choate

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Feels good, and the red is very red just like I wanted! Perfect for the couch and the material is very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order correct size
customer_reviews.text: These pillow covers ate beautiful. Made so well, zipper hidden. I had ordered the size of my 18 inch pillow but the covers ran large had to return them to get the smaller 16 inch, the pillow fit nice and snug now. So many color choices ,i wanted blue and settled on the light blue, even though sky blue was what i wanted but not in person too dull. Love the pillow covers
customer_reviews.author: NIGHTNANC

customer_reviews.title: Magnet for lint
customer_reviews.text: Would have loved these but they pill, and are a magnet for lint hair( they are black, so everything shows on them
customer_reviews.author: randy Depplito

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Vivrant Color
customer_reviews.text: These euro pillow shams are lovely. They are very thick, sturdy material. I bought a really good quality pillow instert from Bed Bath & Beyond and it fills the sham completely. The color is vibrant and looks really good. I haven't had to wash them yet, so I'm not sure how that will go. I thought they were a little overpriced, but the quality is so good that I don't regret spending what I did for them. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: yb

customer_reviews.title: Overall I would strongly recommend buying a different product
customer_reviews.text: I am very frustrated with this purchase. I ordered the light blue color. I read some reviews that said the light blue was brighter than the picture, which I was okay with. The pillow cover I received was completely gray... not even a hint of blue. Also, the material is a rougher canvas than I was expected. Overall I would strongly recommend buying a different product, as you do not know what you are going to end up with.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality seems durable
customer_reviews.text: The pillows seem very durable. They aren’t a soft material but I wasn’t looking for that. I have pets that get on the couch so they seem like they will hold up well with them. Color is great and over all equality is excellent. I read wrong and thought it was two to a pack so I had to reorder another but still decent value for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, color matching a little tricky
customer_reviews.text: These pillow covers are very high quality - sturdy fabric in a canvas-like cotton, well-sewn and with a smoothly functioning zipper. My only difficulty was matching the colors from the photo on the computer screen. My first order was for the Red color, but when it arrived it was more of an orangey-red so I returned it and ordered the Dark Red. The Dark Red is closer to what I wanted but it's still slightly more brick red than cranberry red, and the Wine color looks too dark for my room decor. Like other reviewers have noted, these pillow covers easily attract lint but they're not hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: NigheanRua

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice textured fabric. Zipper works smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the two comforter sets but they didn’t come with the green shams that they showed in the photo. I found these pillow Covers and they were the perfect size. I was so pleased that the apple green color matched the bed skirts from the sets I had purchased. They fit nicely with a little extra room. The zippers are tiny but work very smoothly. A nicely made product. The fabric has texture, so I don’t think anyone would use it for anything but decoration. Very pleased and they have a nice Selection of color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine D. Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: White Sham is Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for euro pilows (26x26) that were a little flat. I ordered the 24x24 white shams (returned the orange ones because they were horribly bright) and was able to stuff them in and zip them and it gave new life to the pillows and look great! The quality of the fabric is good. They washed well - didn’t require ironing - but I only put in the dryer a few minutes to get the wrinkles out and then hang dry. The zipper is sewn well - very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Great Dane Mom

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the same color , I bought the ‘wine ‘ color and it’s a bit duller than it looks in the pics and it is smaller than the size says. Luckily I had smaller pillows that still fit into this case but I was a tad bit disappointed . It does the job . It is not soft material at all - not scratchy or anything its just more of a starched cotton feel to it than I thought it would have . I’m keeping it as it does the job but I would not order again as it wasn’t what I was looking for .
customer_reviews.author: Resheart

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow covers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in white to use as an insert. I filled them with foam rubber from some old cushions that I had. The zipper made it very easy to fill. I then used them as an insert for my existing pillow covers. They worked perfect for me. They are very well made with thick canvas type fabric. The fabric isn’t soft but that didn’t matter to me because I used them as an insert. They’re so nice that I will be buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: G.R.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, and very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is the second TangDepot throw pillow I've bought, and I'm a happy customer. This pillow is 13x13, but it's a bit fat, and as a result the 14x14 pillow is a perfect fit. The cotton canvas isn't real soft, but it's okay, and certainly durable. I got the gold color—it's very upbeat, and I love it. The zipper pull doesn't tuck into the zipper track as I wish it would, but it's small enough that it hasn't scraped my knees—yet. (I put the pillow between my knees when I sleep to prevent sacroiliac joint discomfort, as I sleep on my side.)
customer_reviews.author: B Howell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant colors, Substantial fabrics, extremely well constructed, wonderful attention to detail. Cannot recommend these enough. I completely transformed my daughter’s room using these in a variety of colors and sizes. Will buy many more in the future; cannot recommend enough. I was not paid or compensated or sent any freebies for my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S

customer_reviews.title: Throw pillow cover
customer_reviews.text: Not on par with the quality id get from woven nook or covers from West elm, but the quality is still good. It's cotton, the color is good, isn't rough and is holding up well. Haven't washed them yet, but even update. Well made, and I think it will stand the test of time. I haven't washed it yet. shipping was prompt Update: The quality is great. Washed the covers and no dye transfer. I would still recommend this product. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a deep orange - well, it was actually a very bright and loud orange. Also, I know the picture shows 2 covers, but the description says 1. I purchased thinking you got 2 from what I saw in the picture. Not worth the price for just one when other sellers offer 2 covers for less than what this cover cost. I returned it, got a different set and LOVE the different set.
customer_reviews.author: Briggie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful true purple pillow covers
customer_reviews.text: I love the pillow covers. They are just what I had been searching. They are the first thing that I found that was true royal purple, not eggplant or plum, etc. They bring out the purple in my Mandela pillow cover I got a few months ago from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: shelap

customer_reviews.title: Great quality just a little snug...
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend these pillow covers. The fabric is thick and very durable, the stitching and zipper are excellently done and the color is nice and vibrant, even though it's a powdery pink. My only piece of advice is to order a size up. It fits the insert very tightly and a little more room for the stuffing would have been nicer. I thought about exchanging them for a size up, but didn't feel like going through the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I will buy more.
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of these pillows in different sizes for heat transfer vinyl of different types. I have always had great luck with them and will continue to buy them. On an earlier review I complained because I didn’t get a full credit when I returned two. They have since sent me a credit for the other one that was in the package with the first. I will continue to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy T

customer_reviews.title: Good But Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly thought this pillow cover came as a set of two, so I was surprised and disappointed when my package arrived with only one. The cover is good quality but I ended up ordering a second (as I needed two) and I think $20 is kind of a lot to pay for two 14"x14" pillow covers, especially since there are other sets out there for less. Oh well, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Key word "canvas" not soft like cotton. I missed the word "canvas"
customer_reviews.text: ordered the dark coffee color. the color is a little strange, it looks brown but really on the olive side. Not at all like the photo on my computer. Also, I ordered the 26x26. Silly me, I thought my pillow inserts were 26x26, but no they are 30x30. I stuff the pillow in the insert, it fits really snug. We will see how long the zipper lasts. Oh, and I saw the 100% cotton, but neglected to see the word "canvas' thought it would be a soft cotton. I would say this is more of an outdoor cover feel and look to it.
customer_reviews.author: nvpete

customer_reviews.title: Price is fair, but hair sticks to it a lot
customer_reviews.text: The case seems durable and the color is nice, but my dogs black hair is like a magnet to it. I finally decided to throw away because it was past the return period and I was so tired of picking dog hair off it. I have other pillows on couch and they don't have hair stuck all over them. If you don't have a dog, than these are nice and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Facade

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I got these covers for my couch. They are perfect! I had to purchase pillows for them and went up an inch larger in the pillows as everyone lays on them so that ended up being a great idea. You can remove the covers and wash and dry them. They are durable and i have had no issues with them falling apart or staining.
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These look great on our couch! I was a little skeptical of the size when they arrived, but after managing to carefully squeeze the pillows into the covers, they actually fit just perfectly. The material feels very sturdy and a good quality. I washed them before putting them onto the pillows and the color held as well. Now I just wish they made more sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Ang N

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke. Pet hair magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: I'm now shopping for pillow covers to replace the 3 of these I purchased. The zipper broke in one after approx. 5 washings. What I really hated about them before this happened is that pet hair sticks to these covers like a magnet. That's why I had to wash them every week and probably why the zipper broke (going through the wash so many times). Previous Review: These are quality covers, the red is as I expected it, and they fit perfectly. They stand up to multiple washings. My only gripe is that they are a little rough/scratchy if you want to actually rest your head on them on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Arroz

customer_reviews.title: It sucked product and Amazon customer service
customer_reviews.text: Hated it...only one case in bag...but worse part I gotta go through hell and back to get a refund to my gift card....third party crap...I didn't buy it from a third party...I paid Amazon...do I might as well just St go online to and order straight from vendor and bypass Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Faded after a month on our patio.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very unimpressed with these cases. Not only did they feed after about a month of use in medium Sonny's Seattle Washington, but they wrinkle so easily. Our balcony is fully covered and only gets morning sun...so not sure why they didn't last long...except for the fact that they're cheap. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Meaney

customer_reviews.title: They hold lint
customer_reviews.text: The color, dark blue is nice, the material seems durable and the size was right but they hold lint. I need them for my sofa. I have several other pillows of light and dark colors that dont show lint and brush off easily so I will replace the pillows or the covers since everything light colored shows and sticks.
customer_reviews.author: TeBo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. The fabric is sturdy and the texture is great. It goes well with the greys/grays in our home. We have down pillow inserts and the fabric allows those pillows to squish when you sit with them and to fill back up. We purchased some other tang Depot pillow covers for god area and they weren’t the ones, but they took them back easily enough and we found these by the same people. Great covers.
customer_reviews.author: A Dear and Trusted Friend, Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor use than indoors.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend it for outdoor use. It is not soft enough for my liking. I did not like the sounds of them rubbing together, if that helps. It is not a problem for outdoor use for me. It was sewn decently. The zippers are neatly sewn inside.
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: Not the green I thought it was
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice throw pillow case . The material is good quality but the color is way off for me . It’s described as apple green . I was thinking Granny Smith Apple color green but it’s not the green is darker . It’s not bad but it won’t go with my living room colors . I needed a Granny Smith apple green color to go on a grey coach & white chairs .
customer_reviews.author: LA LA

customer_reviews.title: Well made and as described
customer_reviews.text: This pillow cover appears to be very well made of sturdy but pleasant feeling material - and the hidden zipper is an added benefit. Have used it as an "undercushion" for a chair that needed additional support, so filled it with two layers of medium density foam and the result is great.
customer_reviews.author: reviewerb

customer_reviews.title: Photo and heading description about product misleading
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was ordering two pillow cases because the photo showed two pillow cases... no description of only one pillowcase in the heading... Very angry about a misleading representation... I would not recommend this company to anyone...
customer_reviews.author: Shmanski

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover, read carefully. Overpriced for only 1 cover.
customer_reviews.text: The title says pillow covers, plural. The description says 1 pillow cover. I didn’t read carefully enough so I thought I was ordering 2. The cover is exactly what I wanted but it is overpriced for only 1 cover. I ordered a different color from another seller and received 2 covers for less money. That seller didn’t have this color available. I’m stuck with this one and had to order another one to match. Very misleading and would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Well Constructed!
customer_reviews.text: Bright, vivid color (I ordered tangerine). Recently purchased grey leather sofa and love seat with some beautiful grey pillows (also ordered on Amazon) and need a bit of color to give the room some pizzazz. These cases are beautifully constructed and truly give the accent I was looking for. One suggestion--these are 18" cases, and the 18" down pillow inserts seemed to swim in them. I ordered 19" inserts and replaced them yesterday, and it was a good swap. They are now full and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Florence

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Color Differences !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pillow covers in red, exactly as shown here on top of this page, What I received was 2 covers in the strongest imaginable red, which I can't use for anything ! I know there can be a difference in shade, but I didn't imagine it would be that big a difference ( probable my fault ) ? ! - from this nice soft red on the picture here , to a screaming strong red ! Inside the pillow cover there ought to be written : Kind of material and Washing instructions ! Apart from the above mentioned everything was Okay, Good Service and Quick Delivery !!
customer_reviews.author: Ole Dabelsteen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased pillow covers from this company before and I am happy to report the quality is still there. These covers are such good quality and so durable. Although some might not like the weight and slight roughness of the canvas fabric, I think its just right for a throw pillow. I use them indoors, but i think they would be great for a roofed outdoors patio space.
customer_reviews.author: Lilbee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect style
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for cases for my couch pillows and these are perfect! Thick durable fabric doesn't let the floral print on the pillows show through. They match the cover already on the couch. The long zipper made it easy to get the pillow inside. Overall, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mann

customer_reviews.title: True to color in picture
customer_reviews.text: Great price, looked just like the color in the picture. Not particularly soft but I wasn't expecting it to be.
customer_reviews.author: TurtleGym

customer_reviews.title: Red faded in three months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the red covers in October. By December they had faded badly. It is now March and they are a blotchy medium to light pink. These are on our outdoor patio furniture. I will try another brand. Hopefully, they will last longer than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Stone

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these covers to place over existing pillows. They fit perfectly. The zipper is unnoticeable. My only "complaint" is that I ordered 3 of the same color (yellow) and one of them was a distinctly lighter color of yellow than the other two. Ultimately, it was not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Prunty

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: If you like literally every hair, fuzz ball, string, sticking to your pillow covers- then this is the item for you! I’m especially fond of its unique ability to peel the skin right off your flesh with its abrasive material. As an added bonus, the dye leaks onto everything else in your washer.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow covers !
customer_reviews.text: The color ran true to what I saw on the monitor (yeah, it’s alwsys a bit different) which was nice. I couldn’t find any loose threads inside or outside of these cases. The zippers worked smoothly and the openings were wide enough (20X20) to fit the pillow inserts. Would recommend this for anyone and will most likely buy more !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough about the quality of TangDepots pillow covers. I have two different fabric styles and the material of both is exceptional. As well as i love the hidden zipper. Their is a small tag on the side of the pillows however it is very small & easy to hide. Not to mention proud to promote their product
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hobart

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these pillow covers as an outdoor cover up for some old pillows. These are beautiful! Gorgeous cobalt blue. Very sturdy and well made. An instant refresher for old worn cushions, priced so low I don't feel bad about leaving them in the yard:)) Will purchase from TangDepot again in future.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Accents
customer_reviews.text: These pillow covers are thick and durable, have deep color that lasts and zip smoothly. Euro pillows fit ell and fill the cover nicely. I gave it 4 stars because the fabric is very stiff and rough. It's definitely not soft and supple. Also, because they're overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The color is no where near the picture and very ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is no where near the picture and very disappointing. I would have returned it if I hadn't missed the return window. The pillowcase was at least 1-2 inches larger than my European pillow so the pillow case didn't fit well. All in all a very disappointing purchase. Will be looking at a different vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Well made pillow case
customer_reviews.text: Pillow case washes well and did not shrink much. Color looks forest green in the pictures but the pillow case I got is a little brighter shade of green. The fabric is thick and strong but not scratchy and the zipper works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: A good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These pillow covers are mad of good quality sturdy fabric and fir my pillow quite well. I love that they are washable. I ordered the Navy blue color and it matches my decor nicely. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JWM

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the only reason this was ordered was the price. However, the quality is beyond belief. It's a thick material with a zipper and machine washable. The stitching is well done and it is a prefect fit without struggling to put it on. We are very impressed and highly recommend this to anyone who is interested.
customer_reviews.author: John of Ft Worth

customer_reviews.title: nice deep navy blue, but that material is a lint magnet
customer_reviews.text: perfect, deep navy color. but it attracts every. little. thing. so you don't really see the good solid color - you only notice all the lint and hair pieces that have attached themselves to it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality and versatility for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great basic pillowcase - sturdy, great quality, good color; Would recommend getting pillowcase one size SMALLER than the pillow insert you intend to use to give a fuller look; I used these on replacement pillows for my couch and am very pleased with the purchase. Would definitely re-purchase in other colors for variety or seasonal changes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, basic canvas throw covers
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, zipper is good, not a lot of loose threads. These fit 18x18 , and may even be large enough for an an inch or 2 over, I would not recommend anything under 18 though. It does look nice and seems sturdy. Though I haven't washed it yet, I believe it will hold up okay. So 4.5 stars, because it is a couple dollars over priced for a solid color throw pillow cover, which is only one a step above those in the 3$ range.
customer_reviews.author: Autumnite

customer_reviews.title: product amount
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed when I received my pillow cover. There was a picture of two covers and I thought that was what I was getting. Two not one. I needed two so I had to order another one and the price was a little high for just one.,
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Buy a bigger pillow insert
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow case and looks and feels durable. I read another review that recommended you buy a larger pillow insert than the case size. I bought the 24x24 cover and a 26x26 down pillow insert. Fits nicely and not snug at all. So good to know and good to read reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Chatty Cat

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The quality and dimensions and fabric all seemed fine the only problem was I washed it before realizing it had some type of black oil kind of stuff smeared all over it lightly but definitely enough to notice and good lighting. I have scrubbed with a toothbrush and everything and cannot get it out and it made my entire load of laundry smell like petrol :( I'm guessing something with oily in the factory?
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Best easy redecorating deal!
customer_reviews.text: Good color, coral, and looks great on the bed! This is the only way to go when redecorating. Toss pillows can be expensive and these pillow covers allow changing things up without being stuck. Lots of prints also.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi T

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover but not vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: Bought several different colors to pull out the bright colors of my rug but this purple was not as vibrant and bright as the other colors. It’s still a nice pillow cover, just be aware it isn’t a bright purple.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bur

customer_reviews.title: Saved my boring couch!
customer_reviews.text: The yellow covers saved my boring monotone couch. These punched up the color real quick and I get a ton of compliments on them now.
customer_reviews.author: stevie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight material
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pillows covers for the euro pillows on the sofa of my son and husbands man cave. They can use them as throw pillows on the sofa, to put on carpet for friends to sit on or to use as pillows to nap on sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Seems that the cover is the exact size of the pillow and it won’t even fit. I have to order the next size up and definitely a darker color. Coffee is beige/dark khaki. I use these to cover the old pillows from the couch to allow the dogs to lay on so they stay off the good pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Tanich2uTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! The only thing I'm not sure of is the zippers. When I put the insert into the pillow case, it feels like the zipper could bust when I pull to zip it shut. But so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the purple one
customer_reviews.text: Excellent material, nice, thick fabric and very well made BUT, the purple in the photo looked more like a dark purple. What I received in the mail is a true, bright purple so color is deceiving. I even looked at the shade from 3 different screens and they were all the same shade of purple but again, not what I received. Definitely a Barney purple.
customer_reviews.author: ZoeGirlTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good durable covers!!!
customer_reviews.text: My mistake. . I thought I was buying pillows! The covers came and my husband had some foam rubber he cut and made to place into the covers! Seem very durable. . probably more so than if they had come as pillows! The price was about what you would pay for good grade covers! The color (coffee) was spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know which yellow your ordering!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow cover!! The picture was a little misleading and I ordered the yellow at first because I thought there was only one yellow. But when I got it, it was mustard yellow and not golden like in the picture. But after going back, I realized there was a golden yellow option as well. I received that yesterday and it was perfect!! So if you want the yellow like what's in the picture make sure you order golden yellow or else you will get mustard yellow!! But very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Daun

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Color was true to internet view, quality solid, and the case easily fit over another 18" square pillow. If I need a solid color pillow case again, I'll definitely buy from these folks.
customer_reviews.author: Calmuziclover

customer_reviews.title: Very Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of the lavender pillow covers in Dec 2018; the color is exactly as shown, they are very well-made, the material is good quality (not thin, cheap); and they have held up well even after washing several times.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopperNJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: These look nice for the most part. My only complaint is that the material is a little scratchy and it wrinkles as you use the pillow. But it does wash well and it fits well on the pillows I bought. Color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Hart

customer_reviews.title: Misleading- TWO pillow covers in the main image and the title says "COVERS"; but it is just ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the apple green pillow covers. The product title says: "Cotton solid throw pillow covers". Covers. With an S. That's plural. And the main image shows TWO pillow covers. In fact, there is only ONE pillow cover in the package. To be fair, it is a nice pillow cover. But it was such a disappointing experience to find that I had two pillows and only one pillow cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These pillow covers are awesome. If you have dogs that think every pillow ...
customer_reviews.text: These pillow covers are awesome. If you have dogs that think every pillow you put out for them, this is a miracle. Yes, they are canvas, as stated. The canvas is strong, washable, but not too stiff. Soft as cotton? No, but its a welcome trade for the durability I get out of these pillows, and still very comfortable. Would buy again - actually I did, I have red ones I've been using for almost a year and they stood up so well I replaced my other brand purple covers with another round of these. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Iridal

customer_reviews.title: love the hidden zipper and ease of inserting pillow
customer_reviews.text: love the hidden zipper and ease of inserting pillow. be careful you measure correctly. I tried to put a really flat 16x16 into a 14x14 to puff it up some. NO WAY. You have to get correct size because of zipper placement. colors true to picture but not terribly soft fabric. Otherwise very happy with it. Exchanged for correct size, bought 2 and if needed would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: TEAL blue
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a TEAL blue! I read one of the reviews that stated that, and I'm so glad for that reviewer!Its just what I needed. It is not as bright or as blue as the color shown. There is more green in it - I'd say exactly teal. But not a dull teal - it still has brightness. I just ordered three more.
customer_reviews.author: Chianne

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The pillow cover was just as expected. It matched beautifully with my painting. The color is just as shown here. I also have three kids and these seem to be durable enough to sustain two boys and a 5 year old! I’m unfortunately going to return the orange one because I thought it would be a bit darker but it’s very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Londone Williams

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pillow cover was faded. Tried to return; was told they gave me a .60 credit. Yes 60 cents!!
customer_reviews.author: Punkin

customer_reviews.title: Not soft - like canvas material
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this pillow case would be softer. It's more like a canvas material. It would be ok for pillows that you don't plan on using and just want the cases for looks. They would hold up well. I wanted something softer because I sleep with my pillows. This case is very uncomfortable. And it was only one case, not two, like I expected.
customer_reviews.author: CrabbShack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Bought the orange. It's bright and as pictured. Good quality material and zipper. I'm very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: Nikki80

customer_reviews.title: Ease of fit and good workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the fitting of the pillow cover which I used on print pillows my aunt had made. Wanted to keep this memory of her and the covers allowed that pleasure for me. So fit, plastic hidden zipper and quality of workmanship were very good. However, color of pillow in photo appears darker more like a taupe. Pillow is really a cream color. The feel of pillow fabric more like linen than a satin/cotton feel. Overall, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fades really bad.
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a shaded, covered front porch. It has faded so bad. In a very short time. Yes the sun hits it some in the morning but the porch is covered. I have a small lumbar pillow in front of it and when that lumbar pillow was moved the fading really stood out!
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Good color, thick fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned the yellow would be goldish but these are a nice shade of yellow. I am glad for the thicker fabric as my two large dogs are frequently tumbling on the couch, so they are not likely to be ripped easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: You will love these. I know I sure do.
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected and shown in ad. Color might be just a bit lighter but they look great, fit the pillows I had. These pillow covers certainly are a great by and super value.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these in 4 different colors (watermelon, yellow, orange, turquoise)--and all are beautiful. The only problem is they are in a room that gets a lot of sun and the colors have faded in just a few short months. They are pretty enough that I will probably buy more in the future...
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Different color than expexted
customer_reviews.text: My order consisted of 3 pillow covers ( two 18"x18" and one 12"x20" ) all in the same light blue color. The two 18"x18" covers were the light blue as described and shown in the picture and exactly what I wanted. The 12"x20" was a different color blue and did not match the other two. I returned it and reordered thinking I would receive the correct shade of blue....instead, I was sent the same different color of light blue... I was very disappointed that the three pillows didn't match....am now searching for another12"x20" cover, but this time...a print instead of a solid color... If the colors had been correct, I would have given the rating 5 stars....
customer_reviews.author: M. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love how thick the cover is! I just recently ordered one prior to this that was very thin and see through. This was exactly as pictured and described. My 20x20 inserts fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't have pets
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Deep Coffee color. The size and dimensions are as stated, I purchased the 24 x 24. The reason I am taking away a star is because the material catches every piece of lint that passes it. also, We have a cat and his fur goes right to these covers. Don't recommend if you have pets. If you do purchase you will also want to have a lint roller on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Macaulay

customer_reviews.title: Quality can't be beat for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality cotton pillow cover, I didn't even expect it to be of thick, excellent threading cotton material. It resembles the quality of that Pottery Barn, Ballard Designs or even Restoration Hardware would sell. The color selection provided by TangDepot is awesome too. I'm thinking about the salmon color that matches the pink on my printed PB pillow covers (shown in pictures). I recommend these pillow covers.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I little to stiff
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cause it was the right color and didn't pay that much attention to the material.. Well it is very stiff and scratchy and will have to be washed a lot to break it down.. The color and fit are perfect.. just wish it was softer.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it should be, flimsy seams that tear easily, better options available
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cover an existing 22"x22" eurosham. The color is accurately reflected on the Amazon website, but the pillow cover that arrived was 20"x20" in a package that says 22x22. So, you may have to order a SIZE LARGER than what you actually need. I have 10 pillows, so it's a costly mistake. Also, the seems are flimsy and tear easily, particularly along the zipper opening. The zipper is super tiny (which is good so it does not show or stick out), but I am concerned that the fabric seams will tear with any significant pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Globalaza

customer_reviews.title: fits well. sturdy material. lint magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy canvas material. Fit the pillows that came with my couch perfectly! The deep yellow is quite vibrant... moreso than my phone screen shows, but it's a gamble when purchasing online. Pricey for just a cover. Collects and shows lint from day one. I wish the company's tag didn't show.
customer_reviews.author: DHam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I never write a review until I’ve used the product for awhile. Ive had these pillow covers for several months and they look brand new. Washed once and the color is still bright and vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Scaggs

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I was skeptical on ordering but I’m glad I did. The quality is good... whatever size pillow cover you order get a size up for the inserts. I got 24in covers and 26 inch inserts. It filled the covers pretty well I prob could’ve gone up one more size. Overall I love them
customer_reviews.author: XL

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect color to accent our gray/blue sofa
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect color to accent our gray/blue sofa. I was a bit worried about the color being too bright, but it is exactly what I wanted. The material is good, and the construction is good. I love the invisible zipper, as the tab is not painful if accidentally hit with an elbow.
customer_reviews.author: R Tuten

customer_reviews.title: 26x26 pillow cover
customer_reviews.text: Even though I complained at the time it took to come. It literally comes from China. It is of high quality, will fit one size larger pillow and fill nice. The zipper bottom is good quality too. The material will hold up to a lot of love! Lots of colors to choose, but do not be in a rush .
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: To receive my package. You already charge me
customer_reviews.text: I did not received the white pillow and the inside cushions of the Red ones, I only received the red cover not the pillows The box received only contained the grey pillows and the red covers
customer_reviews.author: Mery Jones-Prout

customer_reviews.title: Thick fabric
customer_reviews.text: I thought this fabric was going to be soft like a pillow case from a sheet set, but it is actually strong and hard, like a pillow case for a sofa. The color is VERY bright.
customer_reviews.author: E. B. Menzel

product_meta.title: TangDepot Cotton Solid Throw Pillow Covers, 18" x 18" , Wine
product_meta.description:
Size:18" x 18"| Color:WineTangDepot® is a registered trademark. 

TangDepot® Decorative Throw Pillow Covers / Euro Pillow Shames are made by TangDepot.com 

Update your living room or family room with new accent pillows. Home furnishings for indoor use. 

The throw pillow cover is perfect for sofas, beds and home decoration. With this removable throw pillow cover (cushion cover), you can change the decor of your room without throwing out your used / old / expensive and comfortable accent pillow or cushion 

The throw pillow cover can be machine washed with mild detergent and air dry, or Dry Clean. 

Note again: 

Actual patterns on the throw pillow cover may differ due to pattern placement on original fabric layout. 

The color of the throw pillow cover / cushion cover may differ due to different monitors. 

Only Throw Pillow Cover (Cushion Cover). PILLOW INSERT IS NOT INCLUDED
feature_bullets: Quantity & Material: 1 pillow cover (Note: Only Cover, and INSERT NOT INCLUDED). 100% Cotton. It is made with light weight, 100% high quality cotton canvas for comfort and durability

Size, Color & Design: 18"x18", Wine. Both the front and the back of the pillow cover have the same color. Choice of 12 Great Colors: Apple green, Brilliant rose, Dark Navy, Deep coffee, Khaki, Light blue, Light coffee, Red, Salmon pink, Watermelon Red, Wine and Yellow.
Soft, Hidden zipper allows easy insertion or removal of a cushion, High-end quality and workmanship, And add a touch of graceful color to your bedroom or living room

BROAD USE: We offer the most size options on the web, from 12 inch square to 28 inch square, and Rectangular lumbar pillow covers, for a variety of application scenarios, Best for any room in your house - bedroom, guest room, kids room, RV, vacation home. Great gift idea for men and women, Moms and Dads, Valentine's - Mother's - Father's Day and Christmas. This throw pillow cover/cushion cover/decorative pillow cover can be used both indoor and outdoor
COVER ONLY (INSERT NOT INCLUDED). imported. Washing Instruction: Machine Washable / Dry Clean. 100% customer satisfaction guaranteed or full refund

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,122 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
